description: The primary function of GMLJP2 (GML in JPEG 2000 for Geographic Imagery) is as a standard for georeferencing JPEG2000 images using Geography Markup Language (GML).  In addition, GML data can be used to encode coverage metadata, geographic features, annotations, and supporting components for coordinate reference systems and unit of measure definitions.

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
